about_the_game:
In Prop Hunt Rumble, two teams go head-to-head in a wild game of hide-and-seek:

  • Props: Transform into everyday objects to hide from the hunters. But don’t just sit still, use special abilities to trap or outsmart them.

  • Hunters: Spot anything suspicious and use your powerful finger projectiles to take down props. No futuristic gadgets here, just quick reflexes and sharp eyes!

Why play Prop Hunt Rumble

  • Unique abilities: Both props and hunters have access to special powers. Props can taunt, become invisible, or even mimic other objects, while hunters can use tools like scans or multi-projectile attacks.

  • Hilarious gameplay: Picture a couch leaping out a window to escape, or a hunter chasing a dancing lamp. Every match is a new adventure full of surprises.

  • No violence, just your finger: Hunters don’t need guns or swords, just their hands to launch powerful attacks. Simple but effective!

Key features

  • 🎨 Unique stylized art style: Dive into vibrant and charming environments full of colorful, cartoonish fun.

  • 🗺️ Creative and diverse maps: Chase props through fun and unexpected locations, from a deserted island or farm to a swamp where any item could be an enemy.

  • 🤝 Online multiplayer: Team up with friends or compete against players worldwide in epic hide-and-seek matches.

  • 🌟 Regular updates: With new maps, skills, and challenges added frequently, there’s always something fresh to discover!

How to play

  • Choose your side:

    • Props: Transform into any object in the environment and use your abilities to outsmart the hunters.

    • Hunters: Search for hidden props and use your finger projectiles to take them down.

  • Use your skills wisely: Props can create decoys or even perfectly camouflage themselves. Hunters have tools to scan and reveal impostors.

  • Stay sharp: Every second counts. Hunters must find all the props before the timer runs out, while props must survive at all costs.

Hide-and-seek like you’ve never seen before

Whether you’re a hiding pro or a master tracker, Prop Hunt Rumble offers a unique experience where wit, strategy, and reflexes are your best allies. Each match is different, with unforgettable moments guaranteed!
detailed_description:
Invite your friends to this crazy hide-and-seek game!

It's best to play with your friends to get the full experience Prop Hunt Rumble has to offer.

name: Prop Hunt Rumble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Prop Hunt Rumble, the multiplayer hide-and-seek game where hunters use their fingers as magical projectiles and props have ingenious abilities to turn the tables! Get ready for a hilarious experience filled with strategy, bluffing, and guaranteed laughter!
